summary: WHEN I ATTEMPTED TO STOP ON A DRY DAY  GOING APPROXIMATELY 20 MPH MY BRAKES DID NOT OPERATE PROPERLY.  THEY GRABBED AND THEN RELEASED WITH A FORWARD MOTION.  I CONTINUED TO APPLY PRESSURE WITH BOTH FEET AND THE BRAKES STILL REACTED IN THE SAME FASHION.  SUBSEQUENTLY I HIT THE CAR IN FRONT OF ME.  I HAD  THE CAR TOWED TO THE MERCURY DEALER AND THEY STATED THEY COULD FIND NOTHING WRONG.   I AM CONCERNED AND ACTUALLY WORRIED ABOUT DRIVING MY CAR.     *TT
